00020 CPassiveVort::CPassiveVort( CExeFile &ExeFile,
00021    CSavedGame &SavedGame, stOption *p_Option) :
00022 CPassive(ExeFile, SavedGame,p_Option),
00023 m_ExeFile(ExeFile),
00024 mp_Map(NULL),
00025 mp_Option(p_Option),
00026 m_RestartVideo(false)
00027 {
00028  mp_IntroScreen = NULL;
00029  mp_TitleScreen = NULL;
00030  mp_PressAnyBox=NULL;
00031  m_GoDemo = false;
00032  m_hideobjects = false;
00033  m_textsize = 0;
00034 }

00036 bool CPassiveVort::init(char mode)
00037 {
00038  mp_Scrollsurface = g_pVideoDriver->ScrollSurface;
00039  m_mode = mode;
00040  if( m_mode == INTRO )
00041  {
00042   mp_IntroScreen = new CIntro();
00043   mp_Map = new CMap;
00044   mp_Map->setScrollSurface(mp_Scrollsurface);
00045   CMapLoader MapLoader( mp_Map );
00046   MapLoader.load( m_Episode, 90, m_DataDirectory);
00047   mp_Map->gotoPos( 64+5*320, 32); // Coordinates of star sky
00048   mp_Map->drawAll();
00049   mp_IntroScreen->init();
00050   mp_Map->changeTileArrayY(8, 15, 2, 560);
00051  }
00052  else if( m_mode == TITLE )
00053  {
00054   mp_Map = new CMap;
00055   mp_Map->setScrollSurface(mp_Scrollsurface);
00056   CMapLoader MapLoader( mp_Map );
00057   MapLoader.load( m_Episode, 90, m_DataDirectory);
00058   mp_Map->gotoPos( 32, 32 ); // Coordinates of title screen
00059   mp_Map->drawAll();
00060   mp_TitleScreen = new CTitle(m_object, *mp_Map);
00061   mp_TitleScreen->init(m_Episode);
00062  }
00063  else if( m_mode == DEMO )
00064  {
00065   // TODO: Setup the demo environment
00066  }
00067  else
00068   return false;
00069 
00070  return true;
00071 }
00072 
00073 void CPassiveVort::process()
00074 {
00075  // Open the Main-Menu or close the opened one?
00076  if( !mp_Menu )
00077  {
00078   if (mp_PressAnyBox==NULL && m_mode == TITLE)
00079   {
00080    mp_PressAnyBox = new CTextBox(150, 10," PRESS ANY KEY ");
00081    mp_PressAnyBox->setAttribs(0, true);
00082    mp_PressAnyBox->enableBorders(true);
00083   }
00084 
00085   if (g_pInput->getPressedAnyKey())
00086   {
00087    // Close the "Press Any Key" box
00088    if(g_pGfxEngine->Effect()) // some effect is running? Close it!
00089     g_pGfxEngine->killEffect();
00090 
00091    g_pInput->flushAll();
00092    if (m_mode != TITLE)
00093    {
00094     cleanup();
00095     init(TITLE);
00096    }
00097    else
00098    {
00099     SAFE_DELETE(mp_PressAnyBox);
00100     mp_Menu = new CMenuVorticon( PASSIVE, m_ExeFile,
00101       *mp_Map, m_SavedGame, mp_Option, m_RestartVideo, m_hideobjects);
00102    }
00103   }
00104  }
00105  else // Close menu
00106  {
00107   if ( mp_Menu->m_demoback )
00108   {
00109    SAFE_DELETE(mp_Menu);
00110    mp_Map->drawAll();
00111   }
00112   else if( m_RestartVideo )
00113   {
00114    cleanup();
00115    init(m_mode);
00116    m_RestartVideo = false;
00117   }
00118  }
00119 
00120  // Modes. We have three: Intro, Main-tile and Demos. We could add more.
00121  if( m_mode == INTRO )
00122  {
00123   // Intro code goes here!
00124   mp_IntroScreen->process();
00125 
00126   if( mp_IntroScreen->isFinished() )
00127   {
00128    // Shutdown mp_IntroScreen and show load Title Screen
00129    cleanup();
00130    init(TITLE);
00131   }
00132  }
00133  else if( m_mode == TITLE )
00134  {
00135   mp_TitleScreen->process();
00136 
00137   if( !mp_Menu )
00138   {
00139    if( mp_TitleScreen->isFinished() )
00140    {
00141     // The Title screen was shown enough time, shut it down
00142     // and load Demo environment
00143     cleanup();
00144     init(DEMO);
00145     return;
00146    }
00147   }
00148  }
00149  else if( m_mode == DEMO )
00150  {
00151   // TODO: Demo modes are processed here!
00152   // TODO: Implement Demos here!
00153   cleanup();
00154   init(TITLE);
00155  }
00156 
00157  // Animate the tiles
00158  mp_Map->animateAllTiles();
00159 
00160  // Blit the background
00161  g_pVideoDriver->blitScrollSurface();
00162 
00163  if(!m_hideobjects)
00164  {
00165   // Make the Objects do its jobs
00166   std::vector<CObject*>::iterator i;
00167   for( i=m_object.begin() ; i!=m_object.end() ; i++ )
00168   {
00169    (*i)->process();
00170   }
00171  }
00172 
00173  // If Menu is not open show "Press Any Key"
00174  if(mp_PressAnyBox != NULL)
00175   mp_PressAnyBox->process();
00176 
00177  // If Menu is open show it!
00178  if( mp_Menu != NULL )
00179  {
00180   mp_Menu->processSpecific();
00181 
00182   if(mp_Menu->mustStartGame() || m_SavedGame.getCommand() == CSavedGame::LOAD) // Start a normal game
00183   {
00184    m_NumPlayers = mp_Menu->getNumPlayers();
00185    m_Difficulty = mp_Menu->getDifficulty();
00186    SAFE_DELETE(mp_Menu);
00187    cleanup();
00188    m_mode = STARTGAME;
00189   }
00190   else if(mp_Menu->getExitEvent())
00191   {
00192    SAFE_DELETE(mp_Menu);
00193    cleanup();
00194    m_mode = SHUTDOWN;
00195   }
00196   else if(mp_Menu->getChooseGame())
00197   {
00198    SAFE_DELETE(mp_Menu);
00199    m_modeg = true;
00200   }
00201   else if( m_RestartVideo ) // When some video settings has been changed
00202   {
00203    cleanup();
00204    init(m_mode);
00205    m_RestartVideo = false;
00206   }
00207  }
00208 }
00209 
00210 void CPassiveVort::cleanup()
00211 {
00212  if(!m_object.empty())
00213  {
00214   for(std::vector<CObject*>::iterator obj = m_object.begin() ; obj!=m_object.end() ; obj++)
00215    SAFE_DELETE(*obj);
00216   m_object.clear();
00217  }
00218 
00219  SAFE_DELETE(mp_IntroScreen);
00220  SAFE_DELETE(mp_TitleScreen);
00221  SAFE_DELETE(mp_Map);
00222 }
00223 
00224 }
